name: DynamicMessageSign
description: Provides communication to a dynamic message sign.

configuration.description: The IP address of the NTCIP Dynamic Message Sign.
The port of the NTCIP Dynamic Message Sign.
If true all messages are sent to the Dynamic Message Sign using NTCIP 1203.
If true all messages are sent to the Sign Simulator using UDP.
Immediately activates the message ID specified, then resets back to -1.
The text to display on the sign for ID 01 with any formatting (see NTCIP 1203).
The text to display on the sign for ID 02 with any formatting (see NTCIP 1203).
The text to display on the sign for ID 03 with any formatting (see NTCIP 1203).
The text to display on the sign for ID 04 with any formatting (see NTCIP 1203).
The IP address of the Sign Simulator that is the receipient of UDP messages.
The UDP port of the Sign Simulator that is the receipient of UDP messages.
